response.internal_thinking: Player shon is placing their first settlement. I need to identify the best available spots for my first settlement. My goal is to secure high-production spots with good resource diversity for my first and second settlements, as I get to place them consecutively. My first pick will prioritize strong production, and my second pick will aim to complement it with missing resources or a useful port. I will prioritize nodes that give me at least two of the four basic resources (W, B, S, Wh) on good numbers for early expansion.

response.internal_thinking: I am in the setup phase and need to place my first settlement. My strategy is to prioritize a location with diverse resources, high-probability numbers (6, 8, 5, 9), and access to resources crucial for both early expansion (Wood, Brick, Sheep) and later game development (Ore, Wheat). I analyzed several nodes, comparing their resource outputs and dice probabilities. Node 41 stands out as an excellent choice because it provides Ore (5), Wheat (9), and Brick (10). This placement sets me up well for both early expansion and long-term victory point accumulation.
